messages.subject: Just an average play day :)
messages.msgSnippet: We did our second garden this year.  Kids harvested the lettuce, now 2 pumpkins are in the house, picked blackberries and blueberries, investigated the brand
messages.messageBody:
We did our second garden this year. Kids harvested the lettuce, now
2 pumpkins are in the house, picked blackberries and blueberries,
investigated the brand new sprouts in the cucumbers, tomatoes, and
watermelons. That is not even touching the flowers that were all
planted with seed. They made a strawberry pie.

We visited the K-9 training center and had a great FIELD TRIP!!!
Watched and learned all about dog grooming, the kennels, cattery, and
the grounds/equipment that is used. Also, on the front page of one
of the local newspapers, unbeknownst to us, was a feature of a family
that is attempting to persuade a neighboring county to invest in a K-
9 unit. AWESOME "reading".

Anyone here in Missouri??

Pam
